text: Ezɨ kɨ Godɨn damazim ko Krais Iesusɨn damazim ko Godɨn enselbar damazibar, kɨ bar deragha kamaghɨn nɨ mɨgei, nɨ bar deravɨra ingangarir kɨ nɨ mɨkemezir kabar amu. Egh nɨ ingangarim damuva, nɨ gumazir ekiaba ko namakabara me isɨ uabɨn toroghan markɨ. Nɨ arazir vamɨra gumazamiziba bar, me damu.
